Hi all,
 
I'd be more than happy to integrate Regis's changes into libarc, =
when I get a spare minute I'll take a look at them and update things approp=
riately. Since I work in a predominant Windows shop now I guess it makes se=
nse to get the tools working there as well. :-)
 
    -tree

Thanks

Mostly porting changes to the original lib were =
made yes, I'll have to
make sure that everything is correctly isolated for =
the next release,
as so far I'm only sure it'll compile on win32. The main(=
) is modified
and lost in functionality and the current usage is :
arcdump =
arcfile
Then you'll get files written to the current directory with name fr=
om
1 to N where N is the number of members of the arc file.

I'll put a not=
e in the README for the next release and update the website.

Regis

ompile to figure what the

ames.
